title: Avoiding Dieting Perfectionism During the Holidays
itunes:title: Avoiding Dieting Perfectionism During the Holidays
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Around Christmas, a lot of people go straight into overwhelm! Today we talk about how to see it coming and avoid those thoughts that stop us dead in our tracks.

We tackle perfectionism around the holidays and how to handle those thoughts about finding just the right gift and fixing just the right meal.
